New_York.Barclay Tower:
The Barclay Tower is a skyscraper located in the Tribeca neighborhood of Lower Manhattan, New York City. The residential building rises 673 feet (205 m) above street level, containing 56 floors for 441 rental units. Construction of the building lasted from 2005 to 2007, with the topping out ceremony happening in Fall 2006. This tower block is also one of the tallest new residential buildings in New York City.
The land that the building is standing on was formerly occupied by 5-story business buildings, including Pearl Desk Company at 10 Barclay Street.
